analysis.key_quote: A foundational principle of career, non-partisan civil servants running the day-to-day operations of our Government is the basis of trust in the American Government.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the reclassification of civil servants as political appointees, emphasizing the importance of non-partisan governance and protections for federal employees. It also critiques the politicization of the civil service, particularly in the context of the Trump administration.
